articles.title: NASA Invites Media to Second Test to Fire Rocket for Artemis Missions - NASA
articles.description: Media are invited to attend NASA’s Space Launch System (SLS) rocket’s second Green Run hot fire – a test of the rocket’s core stage and all of its integrated systems before its flight on the Artemis I lunar mission.
